tha-ap511:0.3_0: As a consequence those senior monks who were fruitless
tha-ap511:1.2_0: aspiring to the level of the bad.
tha-ap511:1.4_0: I keeping the best of cattle.
tha-ap511:2.1_0: I see a fruit of good deeds,
tha-ap511:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap511:3.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
tha-ap511:4.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap511:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap511:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Tārukkha.
tha-ap511:8.1_0: seeing the ninth fruit of the senior monks.
